title: Fragment, 1944-89-4, 900–1400
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave with tie-dye
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Small hollow squares reserved in white are grouped so as to build up a diamond pattern, each enclosing a bird motif on a tan background. Small folds tied and uncapped. Remains of one selvage intact.
